channel.title: Podcast on Vincent Behar
channel.description: Recent content in Podcast on Vincent Behar

item.title: How we are using and contributing to Jenkins X at Dailymotion
item.description: I was interviewed by Jacqueline Salinas from the Continuous Delivery Foundation podcast: The Pipeline: All Things CD & DevOps. We talked about how we are using and contributing to Jenkins X at Dailymotion: our story with Jenkins X our contributions - the web UI & the observability stack - and why we contribute Fresh content available! Check out the latest ep. of The Pipeline: All Things CD & DevOps podcast.

item.title: Interview on the DevOps Radio Podcast
item.description: At the DevOps World | Jenkins World 2019 Conference in Lisbon, I was interviewed by Brian Dawson from the DevOps Radio podcast. We talked about: me Dailymotion Dailymotion’s ad-tech platform Continuous Delivery Jenkins X
